Bash(python -c "
from one_claude.core.scanner import ClaudeScanner
from one_claude.core.models import MessageType

scanner = ClaudeScanner\(\)
projects = scanner.scan_all\(\)

# Find a session with messages
for p in projects:
    if p.sessions:
        session = p.sessions[0]
        print\(f''Session: {session.title}''\)
        print\(f''Project: {session.project_display}''\)
        print\(f''Messages: {session.message_count}''\)
        
        # Load message tree
        tree = scanner.load_session_messages\(session\)
        messages = tree.get_main_thread\(\)
        
        print\(f''Main thread: {len\(messages\)} messages''\)
        
        # Show first few messages
        for msg in messages[:3]:
            if msg.type == MessageType.USER:
                print\(f''  USER: {msg.text_content[:80]}...''\)
            elif msg.type == MessageType.ASSISTANT:
                tools = '', ''.join\(t.name for t in msg.tool_uses\) if msg.tool_uses else ''none''
                print\(f''  ASST: {msg.text_content[:60]}... [tools: {tools}]''\)
        break
")
